DOC.brief_title: Web-based Delivery Effective Treatment Growth Cystic Fibrosis
DOC.detailed_description: Optimizing nutritional status growth improve health outcome survival child cystic fibrosis ( CF ) . Better pulmonary function , measure forced expiratory rate 1 second ( FEV1 ) , associate body mass index ( BMI ) 50th percentile age gender child CF1 . Evidence base practice guideline recommend nutritional treatment child CF age 2 20 year aim achieve maintain BMI > 50th percentile , however across 117 CF center United States 57 % girl 56 % boy fail meet recommendation1 . The investigator develop highly effective behavioral plus nutrition intervention ( BE IN CHARGE ) demonstrate efficacy deliver face-to-face produce weight gain superiority nutrition education alone . Although endorsed CF Foundation evidence-based treatment , available CF Centers family due lack trained personnel , cost , distance issue . With funding CF Foundation investigator develop web-based delivery system efficacious behavioral plus nutrition intervention parent child CF age 4 9 year age . Using Place Outcomes Award investigator conduct beta test web-intervention make appropriate modification . The current study represent next step refine test web-based intervention . This study demonstrate feasibility collect pilot data effectiveness intervention pilot randomize trial 20 treatment na√Øve participant .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis Cystic Fibrosis Ages 4 9 year 50th percentile body mass index age gender parent medical condition would affect diet growth ( e.g. , type 1 diabetes mellitus ) significant developmental delay sputum culture positive Burkholderia cepacia force expiratory volume first second expiration ( FEV1 ) less 40 % receive enteral parenteral nutrition .
